title: 链接群组服发生报错
author: little_Sirius
txt_content:
服务器以bc为前端Kcauldron做子服务器 直接进入子服务器无报错,通过bc就无法进入(添加mod以后)bc后台报错如下14:07:40 [信息] [Ep_Man] <-> InitialHandler has connected 14:07:40 [信息] Loaded player Ep_Man 14:07:40 [信息] [Ep_Man] <-> ServerConnector [lobby] has connected 14:07:41 [信息] Ep_Man has joined the server! 14:07:41 [严重] [Ep_Man] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [lobby] - encountered exceptio n io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException:
